newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkish military plane crashes, two crew missing.
newsitem.headline: Turkish military plane crashes, two crew missing.

text.p: A Turkish air force F-4 Phantom jet fighter on a training flight crashed shortly after take-off from a base in the central province of Konya, state-run Anatolian news agency reported on Wednesday.
The local governor said search operations for the two crew members were continuing. Anatolian quoted him as saying the crash was thought to be the result of a technical fault.
Communication links with the plane were cut at 7.10 p.m. (1710 GMT) on Tuesday evening around 10 minutes after take-off.
The plane's wreckage was found overnight in countryside.
